## Bio

I'm a seasoned leader and strategic thinker with over a decade of experience rolling out data strategies to make businesses run smoother and boost revenue. With more than 20 years in the software and service sectors, I've honed my skills in handling healthcare claim data, procurement data, and enterprise data, all while guiding cross-functional teams to success.

I'm all about soaking up knowledge and growing, and I pride myself on being emotionally tuned in to my team and laser-focused on customers. My true passion lies in using informatics and analytics to shake things up, innovate, and craft outstanding experiences for customers.
